message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. Would you consider $11,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm confident in the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a very fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I understand it's a good product, Alice, but I have a budget in mind.  Could we meet in the middle at $12,000?
